fields.headline: What's new?
fields.bodyText: Spot a dolphin Dolphin-spotting ferry crossings from Fishguard in south Wales to Rosslare, with marine life experts giving a talk on board, run until the end of September with Stena Line (08705 707070). Burma withdrawn The Burma Campaign (www.burmacampaign.org.uk), which calls for tourists to boycott travel companies that operate in the country, is heralding a success as two tour operators - Magic of the Orient and Explorers Tours - have dropped it. Speech lessons Seaham Hall (0191 516 1400; www.seaham-hall.com) is running weekend courses on demand for anyone dreading making a forthcoming wedding speech. Best-men to be will be trained to write and reel off witty one-liners. One night's accommodation, two days of training and First Class return rail travel costs £995 pp.
